Collage Making

Showcase your creativity and artistic skills in our Collage Making competition!

About the Event

  • The Collage Making Competition is an opportunity for students to showcase their creativity and artistic skills by creating unique collages based on a chosen theme.
  • This event aims to inspire participants to express themselves visually and celebrate art.

Event Details

  • Theme: Participants will create a collage based on the theme provided on the day of the competition.
  • Participation: 2 teams per college, each team should contain 3 members.
  • Time Limit: Participants will have 2 hours to complete their collage.
  • Materials: Collage materials will be provided from our side.

Rules & Regulations

  • Collage must adhere to the theme.
  • All work must be original; plagiarized content will lead to disqualification.
  • Collages must be created within the given time frame.
  • Participants should label the back of their collage with their assigned participation number or team name.

Judging Criteria

  • Creativity and Originality: Uniqueness of the collage concept.
  • Relevance to Theme: How well the collage represents the theme.
  • Presentation: Neatness and arrangement.
  • Overall Impact: The visual appeal and thoughtfulness of the collage.
